attributes.action: Do not criminalise parents for failing to get their children to school on time.
attributes.additional_details: Of course the UK want to show the world that we are serious about education, but let the evolutionary breakthroughs that are pooring out of our top universities be a testament to that... Don't criminalise good, law abiding, hard working people - It's completely bonkers!
attributes.background:
We all know how unreliable public transport is and things go wrong on the roads, slowing down traffic.

Charging poor / low income parents £60 for not getting a child to school on time will ruin a lot of families and give them a criminal record.

Are they going to criminalise bus companies too?
